title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2520.10 - Separability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2520.10 - Separability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Code or the application of such
provision to any person or circumstance shall be held invalid, the validity of
the remainder of this Code and the applicability of such provision to other
persons or circumstances shall not be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2520.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
